title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1448/95 of 26 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 establishing the list of representative markets for pigmeat in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1448/95 of 26 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 establishing the list of representative markets for pigmeat in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 is amended as follows:
1. point 7 is replaced by the following:
'7. The following group of markets: Cavan, Rooskey, Waterford, Tralee and Mitchelstown.`
2. point 15 is replaced by the following:
'15. The following group of markets: Helsinborg, Vara, Trelleborg, Skövde, Skara, Kalmar, Umeå, Kävlinge.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(3) OJ No L 203, 15. 7. 1989, p. 23.
(4) OJ No L 338, 28. 12. 1994, p. 18.
